page.title: 02GENERAL DESCRIPTION CONTD.
page.content: TOURISM ALSO PLAYS A PART. THERE IS A CARAVAN CLUB SITE AT TRENANT, AND AT LOWER TRENGALE AND OTHER FARMS, FARM GUESTS ARE TAKEN. THE AREA BOASTS A TOURIST ATTRACTION IN GOLITHA FALLS ON THE RIVER FOWEY. DONIERT THE FIRST CHRISTIAN KING IN CORNWALL DROWNED HERE AND HIS MEMORIAL STONE IS ALSO IN THE BLOCK. FORESTRY IS ALSO IMPORTANT WITH PLANTATIONS OF YOUNG CONIFERS, AND STANDS OF DECIDUOUS HARDWOODS. TO MY KNOWLEDGE THERE ARE NO CLUBS BASED IN THE BLOCK, NOR ANY CHAPELS STILL OPEN. THE CARAVAN SITE AT TRENANT USES A CHAPEL AS WASHROOMS AND LAUNDRY, AND THIS STILL HAS A CEMETERY WHICH IS STILL MAINTAINED. WITHOUT TRANSPORT THIS IS A HARD AREA IN WHICH TO LIVE.
